summary: Hail Dark Brotherhood is a collection of mods made by tilokan1337 which overhaul the Dark Brotherhood.
descriptionHtml:
Hail Dark Brotherhood is a collection of mods made by tilokan1337 which overhaul the Dark Brotherhood.

You can choose which esp to activate according to the features you want.

-Hail Dark Brotherhood - Dawnstar Sanctuary door camouflage.esp : 
The Dawnstar Sanctuary door now only reveals herself to members of The Dark Brotherhood.

-Hail Dark Brotherhood - Dawnstar Sanctuary trapdoor camouflage.esp : 
The Dawnstar Sanctuary trapdoor now only reveals herself to members of The Dark Brotherhood.

-Hail Dark Brotherhood - Dawnstar Sanctuary bone decorations.esp:
Adds bone decorations to the sanctuary.

-Hail Dark Brotherhood - Dawnstar Sanctuary less moanings.esp:
The torture victims only moan when you hurt them.

-Hail Dark Brotherhood - Dawnstar Sanctuary skull ligthing and aeration system.esp !!must be last in load order to avoid ugly grey smoke!!:
Changes the candles and fires to magical floating skulls emiting red light, removes the fog, closes holes in the ceiling, and adds a ventilation system.

-Hail Dark Brotherhood - Ignorant Dawnstar Folks.esp:
The Dawnstar Folks no longer talk about the Dawnstar Sanctuary.

Door camouflage demo:
[youtube]_fjVuw-ldYM&hd=1[/youtube]

Suggestions are welcome.
author: tilokan1337
